Control Name: 4.2. Ensure that 'AuditActionGroups' in 'auditing' policy for a SQL server is set properly
Control Statement: Configure the 'AuditActionGroups' property to appropriate groups to capture all the critical activities on the SQL Server and all the SQL databases hosted on the SQL server
